meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with fried green peas and basic spices. Served with butter and pickle

subCategories: Veg parathas - Aalo, Paneer, Cheese, Gobhi
meals.name: Stuffed Bajre ka paratha
meals.description: Healthy choice

meals.name: Rolls with season vegetable/Paneer/Aloo filling
meals.description: Spicy veggie stuffing in a cripsy maida or wheat paratha topped with extra onions and mayo. Perfect for those weekend breakfast

meals.name: Besan/Suji/Aato Cheela
meals.description: A great option for vegetarians. Add onions, green chilli to the besan batter and enjoy the flaky consistency. Serve with green chutney

subCategories: Moong daal Cheela with Aaloo/veg stuffing and chutney.
meals.name: Moong daal Cheela
meals.description: Use moong dal in place of besan and enjoy the goodness of taste and health in these extra light desi pancakes

meals.name: Veg spring roll
meals.description: A classic Chinese dish that is enjoyed by everyone, children in particular. Spring roll sheets filled with a mix of stir fried veggies and deep fried.

meals.name: Veg Puff
meals.description: Crisp-n-flaky outer layer and mixed vegetables stuffing, is a quick and tasty way of satisfying urge of something savory.

meals.name: Kanda/Batata Poha
meals.description: The all time fav indian breakfast, this recipe includes poha cooked with onions,mustard and peanuts. Serve with coriander and a squueze of lime

meals.name: Bread Poha
meals.description: Cousin to our kanda poha, replace the poha with bread and cook with a medley of ingredients and indian spices.

meals.name: Choora Matar
meals.description: Poha cooked with green peas in mustard seeds and curry leaves. Garnish with coriander,lemon and green chilli

meals.name: Upma
meals.description: Dry roasted rava cooked with mustard seeds, onions and chana dal. Can be made runny or dry. Add a tempering of red chillie for the extra zing.

meals.name: Sevaiyaan Poha
meals.description: Try the savoury version of vermicelli. Cook in oil with peanuts, curry leaves and onions.

meals.name: Sabudana Khichdi
meals.description: The all time fasting favourite, zest up this household darling with peanuts, chana dal, dry red chilli or even chopped boiled potato.

meals.name: Sabudana Vada
meals.description: The all time fasting favourite, sabudana mixed with mashed potato. Yummiest treat when served with green chutney and hot tea/coffee.

meals.name: Veg Noodle
meals.description: Cook them pan fried or deep fired with a choice of veggies, egg, chicken or even sea food. Add sauces as per your taste and enjoy hot

meals.name: Maggi
meals.description: No need to describe this one! India's evergreen favourite is now available in a variery of flavours. For those with the healthy bent, take your pick from the atta noddles version also

subCategories: Pasta with white or red sauce.
meals.name: Pasta with white sauce
meals.description: Pasta of choice cooked in a creamy white sauce of butter, milk, cream and flour. Add veggies or meat as per choice

subCategories: Pasta with white or red sauce.
meals.name: Pasta with red sauce
meals.description: Pasta of choice cooked in a rich red sauce of tomato,garlic,basil and pepper. Add veggies or meat as per choice

meals.name: Pizza/Bread Pizza
meals.description: Play around with toppings and cheese on a mareket bought pizza base and bake till the cheese melt. Replace the base with bread for a less calorie packed version

meals.name: Burger
meals.description: Nothing beats a simple burger with home made veg patty inside on a any evening!

meals.name: Plain Dosa/Masala Dosa
meals.description: Give a twist to plain dosa with a stuffing of masala aalo and red chilli paste. Serve with a choice of chutner, sambhar or even rasam for those with a tangy tongue.
meals.reminders: Soak rice and dal for batter

meals.name: Rava Dosa/Rava Masala Dosa
meals.description: Crispy dosa made with rava and rice flour, accompanied with green chilli and salt. Serve with a choice of chutner, sambhar or rasam

meals.name: Set Dosa
meals.description: Indian version of pancakes, enjoy this dosa with tomato chutney or even curried veggies or meat.
meals.reminders: Soak urad dal and rice for batter

meals.name: Uttapam/Appam
meals.description: Our very own indian pizza, this is the perfect healthy yet delicious breakfast for the entire family. Top wioth onions, capcisum or just eat plain with a sprinkling of gun powder

meals.name: Idli Sambhar
meals.description: Eat them steamed or fried with sambhar, rasam and chutney. Experiment with the oats version also
meals.reminders: Soak urad dal and rice for batter

meals.name: Vada Sambhar
meals.description: Deep fried savoury doughnut best enjoyed with cocunut chutney and piping hot sambhar

meals.name: Iddiyappam Sambhar
meals.description: Noodles shaped idlis enjoyed best with sambhar, chutney or rasam.

meals.name: Bonda Sambhar
meals.description: Deep fried maida bondas are the perfect lunch for those cheat days. Serve with pav and mint chutney

meals.name: Bisibele bhath
meals.description: A wholesome twist on the traditional khichdi, enjoy with veggies and namkeen topping of choice
meals.mandatoryIngrs: Bisibele powder (prepared at home or MTR)

meals.name: Pongal
meals.description: Dal and rice cooked with cashews and indian spices. Healthy and yum!

meals.name: Raagi dosa
meals.description: Be it dosas or uttapam or even upma, ragi makes for a great base for all these dishes in both a healthy and yummy way.

subCategories: Vada Pav/Masala Pav/Misel Pav/Dabeli with fried chilli
meals.name: Vada Pav
meals.description: A maharashtrian culinary delight, try this combination of bonda placed in buttered bun with a layering of red chilli paste. Eaten with deep fried green chilli and hari chutney

subCategories: Vada Pav/Masala Pav/Misel Pav/Dabeli with fried chilli
meals.name: Misal Pav
meals.description: A popular mumbai street food of usal (sprouts curry) topped with onions, tomatoes, farsan (fried savory mixture), lemon juice and served with pav.

subCategories: Vada Pav/Masala Pav/Misel Pav/Dabeli with fried chilli
meals.name: Masala Pav
meals.description: Yummy and spicy mumbai street food. The pav or bread rolls are sliced and then stuffed with a spiced buttery onion, tomatoes and capsicum filling.

meals.name: Dabeli
meals.description: This dabeli is like a sandwich where stuffing is spicy potato mixture with different chutneys, sev, peanuts and pomegranate seeds

meals.name: Pav Bhaji
meals.description: Spicy veg bhaji topped with extra butter and onions served with butter laden buns. A butter treat indeed
meals.reminders: Vegetables should be cooked and mashed

meals.name: Chola Bhatura
meals.description: The baap of all breakfast, enjoy spicy hot chola with maida pooris or bhaturas. Serve with onion rings, lemon and imli chutney

meals.name: Bread pakora
meals.description: Traingle shaped bread pakodi dipped in besan and deep fried. Can be served with ketchup or green chutney

meals.name: Besan pakodi
meals.description: Vegetables dipped in besan and deep fried. Can be served with ketchup or green chutney

meals.name: Bread rolls
meals.description: Bread slices stuffed with spicy potato mix and deep fried and served with ketchup or chutney. Hearty and wholesome indeed

meals.name: Bonda
meals.description: Spicy potato mix with onions, green chilli hand rolled into oval shaped balls, dipped in besan and deep fried. Serve with red chilli chutney and deep fried green chillies

subCategories: Kachori (Aaloo, Daal, Onion etc.) and Samosa

meals.name: Veg Cutlets.

meals.name: Khaman dhokla
meals.description: This all time favourite gujrati dish can be eaten with a variery of chutney. Choose from a tempering of dry red chilli and mustard seeds for that extra punch

meals.description: This all time favourite gujrati dish can be eaten with a variery of chutney. Choose from a tempering of dry red chilli and mustard seeds for that extra punch

meals.name: Thepla
meals.description: Gujarati Methi Thepla, a must try lightly spiced paratha like paratha is prepared from wheat flour, fenugreek leaves and other spices.

meals.name: Handvo
meals.description: Handvo is a baked dish made from various dals/lentils and rice, sesame seeds and spices.

meals.name: Khandvi
meals.description: Popular Gujarati snack! Delicious savoury made of gram flour and curds, tempered with mustard seeds.

meals.name: Pongal
meals.description: Dal and rice cooked with cashews and indian spices. Healthy and yum!

meals.name: Lemon Rice
meals.description: Lemon rice is a favourite with young and old alike in southern india! lemon adds the tanginess, while the tempering imparts the aroma to this simple rice delicacy.

meals.name: Tamarind Rice
meals.description: A tangy twist to favourite rice recipe. A very popular in south india.

meals.name: Curd Rice
meals.description: A delicious south Indian recipe has cooling effect and an aid to digestion.

meals.name: Veg Khichdi
meals.description: A wholesome twist on the traditional khichdi, enjoy with veggies, ghee, pickle and curd.

meals.name: Bisibele bhath
meals.description: A wholesome twist on the traditional khichdi, enjoy with veggies and namkeen topping of choice

meals.description: A healthy and delicious biryani with vegetables and rice.

meals.description: Aata cooked in ghee, water and sugar, can be runny or dry. Garnish with chopped dry fruits

meals.description: Healthy dish made from whole Masoor which is cooked in an onion-tomato masala.

meals.name: Punjabi Chola Masala
meals.description: The Punjabi favourite

meals.description: Yummy white mutter makes delicious side dish when served with hot puris.

meals.description: Paneer mixed with potato, corn floor makes a mouthwatering koftas.

meals.description: This recipe can give the routine home food to restraurant style delight.

meals.name: Stuffed lady finger

meals.description: A tasty and spicy brinjal stuffed with spices that tastes good with Chapati, rice.

meals.description: The not-so-popular raw bananas are also interesting to experiment with in the kitchen.

meals.description: Crispy thin sliced Kundaroo can be favourite among kids also.

meals.description: A very common north india dish during winters.

meals.name: Dahi Suran
meals.description: Dahi Suran Ki Sabzi Recipe (Stir-Fried Yam in Dry Yogurt Curry Recipe) is an innovative recipe tried with diced yam pieces which are tossed with regular Indian spice and coated with thick yogurt.

meals.name: Tawa Paneer
meals.description: A dhaba twist to everyday paneer.

meals.name: Mutter ki Sabji
meals.description: A stir fry Mutter with tangy chilli, lemon.

meals.name: Aalo Beans
meals.description: Healthy and must to include aalo beans goodness to our meal plan.

meals.name: Aalo Soya Methi Sabji
meals.description: Dry aalo soya methi serve hot with daal, chapathi/rice.

meals.name: Aalo Chokha
meals.description: Aloo Ka Chokha -A traditional Bihar preparation.

meals.name: Baigan Bharta
meals.description: Baigan studded with garlic and roasted on an open flame, and then stir-fried with aromatics for the most delicious smoky flavour.

meals.name: Sarson ka Saag
meals.description: A popular vegetarian dish from the Punjab is heavenly treat with Makke ki roti during winters.

meals.name: Bathua/Chawlai Saag
meals.description: Bathua ka Saag is a popular North Indian recipe that is extremely delicious and healthy.

meals.name: Methi Saag
meals.description: Methi saag prepared with fresh and green methi leaves is one of the simple and healthiest recipes with fenugreek.

meals.name: Palak Saag
meals.description: Palak saag or spinach greens is a highly nutritious and delicious saag recipe prepared exactly the same we make sarso saag.

meals.name: Aalo Gobhi Mutter

meals.name: Aalo Baigan Tamatar
meals.description: Add tangy taste to aalo baigan with tomato and chilli.

meals.name: Aalo Mutter/Aalo tamatar

meals.description: Make saadi lauki an interesting one with ginger, chilli and tomato/onion gravy.

meals.name: Aalo Tinde tamatar ki sabji
meals.description: A variety to the meal plan. Tangy tinde with onion tomato gravy.

meals.name: Aalo Torai rasedaar
meals.description: A simple torai rasedaar with chapathi/parathe to detox.

meals.name: Mushroom Mutter

meals.name: Veg Kadhai
meals.description: A melange of veggies in a masaledar gravy

meals.name: Dum Aalo
meals.description: Creamy, rich and spicy Dum Aloo recipe, golden fried baby potatoes cooked in a delicious gravy

subCategories: Green Chana or Green Mutter gravy with Potato.

meals.description: Full of protien diet in yummy way.

subCategories: Green Chana or Green Mutter gravy with Potato.
meals.name: Green mutter gravy with potato
meals.description: Grinded Mutter gravy cooked with potato will be nice addition to the week's plan.

meals.name: Salan
meals.description: Gravy side dish for biryani

meals.name: Vadi Sabji
meals.description: A classic dish of daal vadi with tomato/onion gravy will melt in your mouth.

meals.name: Papad ki Sabzi
meals.description: Rajasthani Curry is famous papad sabzi, quick to make that required daily home spices

meals.name: Kadhi
meals.description: A very popular Kadhi, love it or not.

meals.name: Soya Mutter
meals.description: Soya nuggets cooked in spicy onion tomato masala.

meals.name: Dahi Aalo
meals.description: Easy to prepare delicious recipe of potatoes simmered in curd gravy.

meals.description: A unique way of preparing baigan curry with deep fried brinjal and spiced and cooked yoghurt curry.

meals.name: Mutter Paneer

meals.name: Kadhai Paneer with onion, capsicum and tomato
meals.description: Kadai paneer, a mouthwatering combination of paneer, capsicum, tomato, onion and traditional Indian spices.

meals.name: Tawa Paneer
meals.description: A crazy week nights, Tawa Paneer happens to be one my most favourite. A semi-dry paneer dish made with cottage cheese aka paneer, onions, capsicum and tomatoes.

meals.name: Palak Paneer
meals.description: A goodness of Palak with delicious paneer, defintely will melt in your mouth.

meals.name: Paneer Bhurji
meals.description: All time favourite.

meals.name: Plain Dosa/Masala Dosa
meals.description: Give a twist to plain dosa with a stuffing of masala aalo and red chilli paste. Serve with a choice of chutner, sambhar or even rasam for those with a tangy tongue.
meals.reminders: Soak rice and dal for batter

meals.name: Rava Dosa/Rava Masala Dosa
meals.description: Crispy dosa made with rava and rice flour, accompanied with green chilli and salt. Serve with a choice of chutner, sambhar or rasam

meals.name: Set Dosa
meals.description: Indian version of pancakes, enjoy this dosa with tomato chutney or even curried veggies or meat.
meals.reminders: Soak urad dal and rice for batter

meals.name: Benne
meals.description: NA

meals.name: Idli Sambhar
meals.description: Eat them steamed or fried with sambhar, rasam and chutney. Experiment with the oats version also
meals.reminders: Soak urad dal and rice for batter

meals.name: Vada Sambhar
meals.description: Deep fried savoury doughnut best enjoyed with cocunut chutney and piping hot sambhar

meals.name: Iddiyappam Sambhar
meals.description: Noodles shaped idlis enjoyed best with sambhar, chutney or rasam.

meals.name: Bonda Sambhar
meals.description: Deep fried maida bondas are the perfect lunch for those cheat days. Serve with pav and mint chutney

meals.name: Uttapam/Appam
meals.description: Our very own indian pizza, this is the perfect healthy yet delicious breakfast for the entire family. Top wioth onions, capcisum or just eat plain with a sprinkling of gun powder

meals.name: Bisibele Bhath
meals.description: A wholesome twist on the traditional khichdi, enjoy with veggies and namkeen topping of choice
meals.mandatoryIngrs: Bisibele powder (prepared at home or MTR)

meals.name: Pongal
meals.description: Dal and rice cooked with cashews and indian spices. Healthy and yum!

meals.name: Raagi Dosa
meals.description: Be it dosas or uttapam or even upma, ragi makes for a great base for all these dishes in both a healthy and yummy way.

meals.name: Veg Manchurian with steamed rice
meals.description: An Indo-Chinese veg manchurian with steamed rice is loved by everyone.

meals.name: Chilli Paneer
meals.description: Chilli Paneer, spicy, flavoured can give a yummy twist to meal plan.

meals.name: Veg Noodles
meals.description: A perfect lunch for those cheat days.

meals.name: Gobhi Manchurian with steamed rice
meals.description: An Indo-Chinese gobhi manchurian with steamed rice is loved by everyone.

meals.name: Schezwan Fried Rice
meals.description: A spicy hot schezwan fried rice is a perfect mouth watering twist.

meals.name: Schezwan veg roll
meals.description: Be it packing for lunch, or grabbing a quick bite. Frankie or Rolls, is something we all enjoy.

meals.name: Veg Biryani
meals.description: A healthy and delicious biryani with vegetables and rice.

meals.name: Veg Pulao
meals.description: Flavorful masala vegetable pulao is a perfect as a lunch box with raita.

meals.name: Veg Fried Rice
meals.description: Very simple yet delicious veg fried rice.

meals.name: Tehri with seasonal veg
meals.description: Tehri is a popular pulao recipe, loved for its homely taste and nutritious value. The spicy rice with potato and vegetables is served as main course.

meals.name: Lemon Rice
meals.description: Lemon rice is a favourite with young and old alike in southern india! lemon adds the tanginess, while the tempering imparts the aroma to this simple rice delicacy.

meals.name: Curd Rice
meals.description: A delicious south Indian recipe has cooling effect and an aid to digestion.

meals.name: Tamarind Rice
meals.description: A tangy twist to favourite rice recipe. A very popular in south india.

meals.name: Puliogure Rice
meals.description: Tangy rice preparation with combination of Indian spices.

meals.name: Aaloo Parathas
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with mashed potato,onions, garlic, ginger, green chillies and basic spices. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Pyaz Parathas
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas made of onion dough. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Methi Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with chopped Methi leaves, Jeera, oil, chillies, salt, chat masala Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Muli Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with grated radish/muli with onions, garlic, ginger, green chillies and basic spices. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Gobhi Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with grated gobhi and basic indian spices. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Daal Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with fried and grinded dal,chillies and basic spices. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Sattu Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with sattu,onions, garlic, ginger, green chillies and basic spices. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Palak Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas made of spinach and basic spices mixed in dough. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Cheez Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with grated cheese, onions, garlic, ginger, green chillies and basic spices. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Aaloo Kasoori Methi Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with mashed potato,kasoori methi, green chillies and basic spices. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Spring Onion Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas made of spring onions mixed in dough with chillies and basic spices. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Green Pea Paratha
meals.description: Melt in your mouth parathas stuffed with fried green peas and basic spices. Served with butter and pickle

meals.name: Stuffed Bajre ka paratha
meals.description: Healthy choice

meals.name: Rolls with season vegetable/Paneer/Aloo filling
meals.description: Spicy veggie stuffing in a cripsy maida or wheat paratha topped with extra onions and mayo. Perfect for those weekend breakfast

meals.name: Kulcha/Maida Paratha
meals.description: Stuff the Kulcha with your choice of filling and serve with any curry.

meals.name: Methi Puri
meals.description: Healthy twist to everyone's favourite Poori.

meals.name: Ajwain Puri
meals.description: Deep fried wheat and ajwain poori served hot with rasedaar subzi/aalo bhujiya/pickle/chutney

meals.name: Poori Saagu
meals.description: Cook veggies the south indian way and throw in some hot pooris to satiate your taste buds

meals.name: Veg Noodles/Chowmin
meals.description: Cook them pan fried or deep fired with a choice of veggies, egg, chicken or even sea food. Add sauces as per your taste and enjoy hot

meals.name: Maggi
meals.description: No need to describe this one! India's evergreen favourite is now available in a variery of flavours. For those with the healthy bent, take your pick from the atta noddles version also

subCategories: Pasta with white or red sauce.
meals.name: Pasta in white sauce
meals.description: Pasta of choice cooked in a creamy white sauce of butter, milk, cream and flour. Add veggies or meat as per choice

subCategories: Pasta with white or red sauce.
meals.name: Pasta in red sauce
meals.description: Pasta of choice cooked in a rich red sauce of tomato,garlic,basil and pepper. Add veggies or meat as per choice

meals.name: Pizza/Bread Pizza
meals.description: Play around with toppings and cheese on a mareket bought pizza base and bake till the cheese melt. Replace the base with bread for a less calorie packed version

meals.name: Burger
meals.description: Nothing beats a simple burger with home made veg patty inside on a any evening!

meals.name: Pav Bhaji
meals.description: Spicy veg bhaji topped with extra butter and onions served with butter laden buns. A butter treat indeed
meals.reminders: Vegetables should be cooked and mashed
